findings.title: Public MCP server without auth
findings.rationale: Unauthorised access risk; potential data exfiltration.
findings.remediation: Enforce auth; restrict network exposure; add rate limiting.

findings.title: Missing request auditing
findings.rationale: Weak incident response; gaps in forensic trails.
findings.remediation: Enable structured logging; forward to SIEM; set retention.

findings.title: No input schema validation
findings.rationale: Risk of malformed inputs and injection vectors.
findings.remediation: Validate with Zod; reject invalid; sanitise strings.

findings.title: No prefers-reduced-motion handling
findings.rationale: Accessibility and comfort concerns for motion-sensitive users.
findings.remediation: Add reduced-motion path; avoid layout-thrashing animations.
